amendment.description: Amendment establishes the oath of renunciation and allegiance as Federal law so that it cannot be changed without an act of Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 109-350 to establish the Oath of Renunciation and Allegiance as Federal law so that it cannot be changed without an act of Congress. Also requires the Secretary of Homeland Security, in cooperation with the Secretary of State, to notify a foreign embassy of which a new citizen was a citizen or subject that the citizen has: (1) renounced allegiance to that foreign country; and (2) sworn allegiance to the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryun (KS) amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
